link_type_desc: A Uses B (eg code package uses source data table)
A updates B (eg S_MDM_* updates C_MDM_*)
A logs refresh details to B (eg MDM_refresh logs to C_MDM_ETL_LOG)
A is a type of B (eg grouping log tables together and linking to tables)
A has B as part of it (eg a Database schema HAS tables)
